[File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/loader/function.rs] [Struct: Function] [Gas Exploit] Can local_tys be manipulated to report fewer locals than actually used, causing under-charging of gas and potential DoS through resource exhaustion? (Medium)
